snippet.title: PS4 - The PlayRoom - Ninja bots
snippet.description:
Got a camera with your PS4? Then got your Ninja bots on! Yes, use the controller to control your little ninja dudes as they race through a stage collecting coins and throw shuriken's a little Ronins. 
It's free and quite a bit of fun!
